item.title: Write Your First Go App With Unit Tests and Code Coverage
item.description: Go is a compiled, statically typed programming language created by Google. Before starting I will assume that you installed Go and printed a hello world. if you didn’t do that yet install Go on your machine from here. What I will discuss/share with u here is how we could write a simple app that sum two integers with a TDD and Code Coverage. Step 1 : Starting a new Go Project I will create a simple main.
